== Karimkunnam (Part) (628095) ==

== Geographic Location and Population ==

Karimkunnam (Part) is a village in the [[Thodupuzha]] taluka of [[Idukki ]] district with an area of 2175 hectares and harbouring 3030 households with total population of 11956 as per the 2011 Census. The nearest town [[Thodupuzha]] is at a distance of 7 km. Male population is 6024 and female population is 5932. Scheduled Caste Population is 927 and Scheduled Tribes population is 102. Census Location Code of the village is 628095<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.


== Literacy ==  
* Total literate population: 10702 (89.51%)
* Literate male population: 5404 (89.71%)
* Literate female population: 5298 (89.31%)
